data.name: 0000 (196.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi. Tell this to Koizumi for me.

data.name: 0001 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Tell Koizumi? What?

data.name: 0002 (196.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: To do something about that pasted-on smile. I can't trust it.

data.name: 0003 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Are you stupid?

data.name: 0004 (196.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm trying to be serious.

data.name: 0005 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's even like he's smiling non-stop throughout the day or anything.

data.name: 0006 (196.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You sure? It certainly seems that way to me.

data.name: 0007 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's impossible for anyone to do that.

data.name: 0008 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Stop being stupid and keep moving. We're in a rush, you know!

data.name: 0009 (196.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Haruhi seems to have a lot of trust in Koizumi, huh. I guess shouldn't be surprised.

data.name: 0010 (196.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Suzumiya, have you ever seen Koizumi looking angry?

data.name: 0011 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi looking angry? I haven't.

data.name: 0012 (196.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You never see him angry because he's always smiling, right…

data.name: 0013 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, what of it?

data.name: 0014 (196.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I was wondering if he doesn't get tired smiling all the time like that.

data.name: 0015 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well if he were tired, he'd pull a tired face instead. What are you talking about?

data.name: 0016 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon always looks tired and does nothing but complain, doesn't he?

data.name: 0017 (196.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Well Kyon does smile every once in a while…

data.name: 0018 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're talking about bitter smiling. That doesn't count as smiling.

data.name: 0019 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You need to properly develop your observational skills, Mikuru.

data.name: 0020 (196.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: R-right…

data.name: 0021 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Smile…

data.name: 0022 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh? What did you just say?

data.name: 0023 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: My smile is insufficient.

data.name: 0024 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Smile? Like, the thing you do with your face?

data.name: 0025 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0026 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's wrong, Yuki? Why would you say that all of a sudden?

data.name: 0027 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Itsuki Koizumi.

data.name: 0028 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: His smile never falters.

data.name: 0029 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You thought your smile isn't good enough compared to Koizumi's?

data.name: 0030 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I don't know, but it may be the case.

data.name: 0031 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't worry about that, Yuki. That's your character!

data.name: 0032 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: My character.

data.name: 0033 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yes, your character is quiet, blank-faced, and cool.

data.name: 0034 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's no point forcing a smile.

data.name: 0035 (196.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Really?

data.name: 0036 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't pay it any mind. Look, we need to hurry ahead or the piano's gonna get away.

data.name: 0038 (196.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I just thought of something that happened a little earlier...

data.name: 0039 (196.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I received some valuable feedback with regards to my face…

data.name: 0040 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Your face?

data.name: 0041 (196.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. According to someone--I smile non- stop, and amongst other things it's creepy.

data.name: 0042 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So it was Kyon, huh. I can't think of anyone else who would say something so rude.

data.name: 0043 (196.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: An impressively well judged guess, Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0044 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You mustn't let that bother you. Even Kyon's face is always pouting and sulking.

data.name: 0045 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Even when you think he's smiling, it always turns out to be a pained smile.

data.name: 0046 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And it's not like Yuki is particularly blessed with expressions. Just don't worry about it.

data.name: 0047 (196.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Thank you very much.

data.name: 0048 (196.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Well, I'm not gonna deny I'd like to see you looking angry at least once.

data.name: 0049 (196.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If the chance arises, then of course.
